Package com.osscameroon.jsgenerator.service

Interface ConvertService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConvertServiceImpl
    public interface ConvertService
    Provides the convertion logic from Html to Js.
    Author:
    Fanon Jupkwo, Elroy Kanye

      Converts the Html string to Js string.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        String convert​(String content)
        throws NoHTMLCodeException
        Converts the Html string to Js string.
        Parameters:
        content - the Html string
        Returns:
        a String Object containing Js
        Throws:
        NoHTMLCodeException - if content is null

      • convertHtmlFiletoJsFileFromCommandLineInterface

        void convertHtmlFiletoJsFileFromCommandLineInterface​(String htmlFileName)
                                              throws NoHTMLFileNameException,
                                                     IncorrectHTMLFileNameException,
                                                     HTMLFileNotFoundException
        Converts the Html file already located in "src/main/resources/htmlFilesInput/" to Js file generated in "src/main/resources/jsFilesOutput/" folder. Concerning this library, by default, the input folder exists but the output folder don't. Likewise, When a project will use jsgenerator as dependency or plugin, an input folder will be created as soon as possible its classpath will contain jsgenerator.
        Parameters:
        htmlFileName - the Html file name
        Throws:
        NoHTMLFileNameException - if htmlFileName is null
        IncorrectHTMLFileNameException - if htmlFileName is incorrect
        HTMLFileNotFoundException - if the html file is not found

      • convertHtmlFiletoJsFileFromCommandLineInterface

        void convertHtmlFiletoJsFileFromCommandLineInterface​(String[] args)
                                              throws NoHTMLFileNameException,
                                                     EmptyHTMLFilesListException,
                                                     DuplicatedHTMLFileNameException
        Converts each Html file already located in "src/main/resources/htmlFilesInput/" to Js file generated in "src/main/resources/jsFilesOutput/" folder. Concerning this library, by default, the input folder exists but the output folder don't. Likewise, When a project will use jsgenerator as dependency or plugin, an input folder will be created as soon as possible its classpath will contain jsgenerator.
        Parameters:
        args - the array of Html files names
        Throws:
        NoHTMLFileNameException - if args is null
        EmptyHTMLFilesListException - if args is empty
        DuplicatedHTMLFileNameException - if args contains duplicates

      • convertHtmlFiletoJsFileFromWeb

        void convertHtmlFiletoJsFileFromWeb​(String htmlFileName,
                                    String outputFolder)
        Converts the Html file to Js file generated in output folder. It is similar to convertHtmlFiletoJsFileFromCommandLineInterface(String) but it will be useful for the web API.
        Parameters:
        htmlFileName - the Html file name
        outputFolder - the output folder containing the generated Js file
